name: Omegle Modern for Roleplay
description: Meant to emulate more attractive chat systems, this style is easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
Removes: 
"You:" & "Stranger:" 
Omegle's color 

Adds: 
Blue bubbles from "You"
Light grey bubbles from "Stranger"
iMessage inspired bubbles which can support long, paragraph based, rp.
